welcomeToPrereview.message: Welcome to PREreview! You can use this page to help authors, editors, and other PREreviewers learn more about your interests, work, and review activity.

onlyYouCanSee.message: Only you can see this page. You have two profile pages that everyone can see:

slackCommunityName.description: Label for showing the name the user is using on the Community Slack

openReviewRequests.description: Label for if the user is open to receiving review requests

enterResearchInterests.description: Link text to where the user will type in their research interests

imageTypeError.message: <error>Error:</error> The selected file must be a AVIF, HEIC, JPG, PNG or WebP

imageSizeError.message: <error>Error:</error> The selected file must be smaller than {size, number} MB

youCanUploadAvatar.message: You can upload a photo or image to use as your avatar. The selected file must be smaller than {size, number} MB.

showOnPublicProfile.message: We’ll show your avatar on your public profile.

removeAvatarFromProfile.message: We’ll remove your avatar from your profile.

canUploadNewOne.message: You will be able to upload a new one at any time.

whatCareerStage.message: <error>Error:</error> What career stage are you at?

selectCareerStageError.message: <error>Error:</error> Select which career stage you are at

seeCareerStage.message: Who can see your career stage?

showOnPublic.message: We’ll show it on your public profile.

showThemOnPublic.message: We’ll show them on your public profile.

saySoOnPublic.message: We’ll say so on your public profile.

noOneElseKnow.message: We won’t let anyone else know.

willNotShare.message: We won’t share it with anyone else.

willNotShareThem.message: We won’t share them with anyone else.

enterEmailAddressFormatError.message: <error>Error:</error> Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@example.com

usedToContactYouAboutYourAccountAndPrere.message: We’ll only use this to contact you about your account and PREreviews.

whatLanguages.message: What languages can you review in?

happyTakeRequests.message: <error>Error:</error> Are you happy to take requests for a PREreview?

selectHappyTakeRequestsError.message: <error>Error:</error> Select yes if you are happy to take requests for a PREreview

seeHappyTakeRequests.message: Who can see if you are open for review requests?

seeWhatResearchInterests.message: Who can see your research interests?
